name: geocoding
description:
This is a sub-function API for tool address_normalization_and_geocoding.
Tool description: Takes free text address input, standardizes and outputs rooftop latitude/longitude geocode coordinates.
API description: Performs geocoding to convert an address into a standardized, normalized address and rooftop latitude/longitude coordinates using the RapidAPI service.

address.description: The physical address to be geocoded.
